name: Cubikes | Desert Dirt Bikes Racing & Crafting Game For Free
name_original: Cubikes | Desert Dirt Bikes Racing & Crafting Game For Free
description:
Motorcycle game for fans of the world of motor racing.
Best trial mine motorbikes game to drive through the desert!

Download now this funny pixel game for kids, fun is guaranteed.

Drive your blocky motorbike through the desert dodging all obstacles, doing stunts and adding all the points you can.
This game has different levels of difficulty, the farther you go the harder it will get to the next level!

You have to control your vehicle to keep from falling in the wrong position or you'll have to start the level again.
To do this, control the dirt bike and keep balance while you accelerate, break and do stunts to score points.
Take gasoline so you do not run out of fuel and can reach the finish line.

This motocross game has been created for the entertainment of both children and adults and is great funny.
Download it now and drive like you're a real moto driver!

- Scenarios and blocky pixel motorbikes
- Game suitable for all ages
- Different levels of difficulty
- Win all the missions of the race
- Reach the highest score craft
- Win the race with your bike trial mine
